full_text: OFFER OF EMPLOYMENT FOR HERLINDO MALDONADO ORDAZ: Hon. United States Consul, Monterrey, N. L., Mexico Dear Sir, I, Noble Denbo, 902 Austin Street, Alamo, Texas, do hereby certify that at the present time I have 55 acres of land, said land being located South of Alamo, Texas. Said land contains of Citrus Fruits. I also own farming equipment of considerable value. I do my Banking business with the McAllen State Bank of McAllen, Texas. I also want to state that I am aware of the fact that HERLINDO MALDONADO ORDAZ, desires to obtain a Passport to enter to the United States, for the purpose of establishing his permanent residence in this Country, and if a Passport is granted to the said HERLINDO MALDONADO ORDAZ, and should he apply to me for a job, I will employ him as a Farm Laborer with a salary averaging $35.00 per week, I will also furnish him a house in which he may live, said house will have all utilities. He may work for me as long as he may so desire or as long as it may be satisfactorily to a11 concerned. Any courtesies and considerations extended the said Herlindo Maldonado Ordaz will be highly appreciated by the undersigned. I need Herlindo badly to work for me. Respectfully Nahl Denite Noble Denbo 902 Austin Street Alamo, Texas Given under my hand and seal of office this the 27th day of April, 1962. Notary Public and for County, Texas Jein in Render Hidalgo
